name: infinite-llm-dialogue-back
description: AWS Lambda function for generating responses using Google Generative AI

scripts.update-lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name CallAIAPI --region us-east-1 --s3-bucket for-lambda-zip-uploads --s3-key deployment-package.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run bump && npm run zip && npm run upload-s3 && npm run update-lambda && npm run delete-s3

author: Your Name
